pageTitle: Felipe Massa saves tyres for race despite Q3 chance in Bahrain | Bahrain Grand Prix | Formula 1 news, live F1 | ESPN.co.uk
textBeforeTable: Qualifying Bahrain Grand Prix 2012 ad_counter++; document.write(' var omniStoryId = "76644"; var omniAuthId = "ESPN Staff"; var omniSiteSection1 = "Ferrari site"; var omniCt = "story"; var omniPageName = "news:Massa saves tyres for race despite Q3 chance"; "We will try and get a good start and to use our strategy to make up positions. We know from our recent experience in Shanghai that, for us, overtaking is more complicated than for others. Here we suffer especially with a lack of traction coming out of the slower corners and that's why I expect we will be fighting on the defensive in the race." Massa also agreed with Fernando Alonso's assessment that Ferrari would have to make up places at the start
